docs.summary: A catalog containing all bookings services

params.doc: Field names to return in response (leave empty to get all fields).

ret.doc: A full catalog detailed response containing all the information related to a service.

params.name: query.fields
params.doc: Projection on the result object - list of specific field names to return. If fieldsets are also specified, return the union of fieldsets and fields

params.name: query.fieldsets
params.doc: Projection on the result object - list of named projections. E.g. "basic" will return id and name fields. Specifying multiple fieldsets will return the union of fields from all. Specifying fieldsets and fields will also return the union of fields.

ret.doc: A list of catalog service response.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of services, given the provided filtering.
 Returns a list of enriched services; Based on the invoker permissions and the request query.
Query object support:
- **filter**: supports
  - `service.id` - query for a specific service.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.id": "46ce4cd4-46ff-4aa7-9cc0-02fd4f0f3209" }" }"```.
  - `category.id` - query for all services that belongs to the category.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "category.id": "55ce4cd4-46ff-4aa7-9cc0-01fd4f0f3209" }" }"```.
  - `service.info.name` - query for all services with given name.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.info.name": "haircut" }" }"```.
  - `service.info.tagLine` - query for all services with given tag line.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.info.tagLine": "short haircut" }" }"```.
  - `service.policy.isBookOnlineAllowed` - query for all services that can be booked online.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.policy.isBookOnlineAllowed": true }" }"```.
  - `category.name` - query for all services that belongs to categories with given name.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "categoty.name": "hair services" }" }"```.
  - `service.customProperties.tag` - query for all services that has given tag.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.customProperties.tag": "hair services" }" }"```.
  - `service.paymentOptions.wixPayOnline` - query for all services that can be payed Online with Wix Pay.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.paymentOptions.wixPayOnline": true }" }"```.
  - `service.paymentOptions.wixPayInPerson` - query for all services that be payed Offline with Wix Pay..
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.paymentOptions.wixPayInPerson": true }" }"```.
  - `service.paymentOptions.wixPaidPlan` - query for all services that can be booked using a paid plan.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.paymentOptions.wixPaidPlan": true }" }"```.
  - `service.paymentOptions.custom` - query for all services that has a custom payment method.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.paymentOptions.custom": true }" }"```.
  - `slugs.name` - query for service with given slug.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "slugs.name": "woman-hair-cut" }" }"```.
  - `schedules.tags` - query for all services that has a schedule with given tag and status `CREATED`.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "schedules.tags": "Group" }" }"```.
  - `resources.id` - query for all services that are given by a given resource, taking into account only ACTIVE status service schedule.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "resources.id": "46ce4cd4-46ff-4aa7-9cc0-02fd4f0f3209" }" }"```.
  - `service.policy.bookingsApprovalPolicy.isBusinessApprovalRequired` - query for all services that require business approval.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.policy.bookingsApprovalPolicy.isBusinessApprovalRequired": true }" }"```.
  - `service.schedules.availability.locations.businessLocation.ids` - Not supported. Query for all services that have at least one of the specified locations.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.schedules.availability.locations.businessLocation.ids": ["66a2674c-9267-4600-826e-f463957b9446", "66a2674c-9267-4600-826e-f463957b9447"] }" }"```.
- **paging**: Supported. Limit Example: "query { paging { limit { value: 10 } } }". Offset Example: "query { paging { offset { value: 10 } } }". Default paging: "query { paging { offset { value: 0 } limit { value: 25 } } }"
- **fieldsets**: not supported.
- **fields**: any projection is supported.
    Example: query { fields ["service.id", "service.status", "service.info.name"] }
**Important**:
  Calling List without any filter, will return all non deleted services.
- All results are for one specific business, resolved from the request context.

> **Permissions**  
> This endpoint requires the Read Bookings - Public Data, the Read Bookings - Including Participants or the Manage Bookings permissions scope

examples.title: Get Services Catalog

extra.description: Returns all the catalog services in the site.
Returns the services catalog, with only the requested fields.

params.name: query.fields
params.doc: Projection on the result object - list of specific field names to return. If fieldsets are also specified, return the union of fieldsets and fields

params.name: query.fieldsets
params.doc: Projection on the result object - list of named projections. E.g. "basic" will return id and name fields. Specifying multiple fieldsets will return the union of fields from all. Specifying fieldsets and fields will also return the union of fields.

ret.doc: A list of catalog service response.

docs.summary:
Retrieves a list of services, given the provided filtering.

Query object support:
- **filter**: supports
  - `service.id` - query for a specific service.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.id": "46ce4cd4-46ff-4aa7-9cc0-02fd4f0f3209" }" }"```.
  - `category.id` - query for all services that belongs to the category.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "category.id": "55ce4cd4-46ff-4aa7-9cc0-01fd4f0f3209" }" }"```.
  - `service.info.name` - query for all services with given name.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.info.name": "haircut" }" }"```.
  - `service.info.tagLine` - query for all services with given tag line.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.info.tagLine": "short haircut" }" }"```.
  - `service.policy.isBookOnlineAllowed` - query for all services that can be booked online.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.policy.isBookOnlineAllowed": true }" }"```.
  - `category.name` - query for all services that belongs to categories with given name.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "categoty.name": "hair services" }" }"```.
  - `service.customProperties.tag` - query for all services that has given tag.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.customProperties.tag": "hair services" }" }"```.
  - `service.paymentOptions.wixPayOnline` - query for all services that can be payed Online with Wix Pay.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.paymentOptions.wixPayOnline": true }" }"```.
  - `service.paymentOptions.wixPayInPerson` - query for all services that be payed Offline with Wix Pay..
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.paymentOptions.wixPayInPerson": true }" }"```.
  - `service.paymentOptions.wixPaidPlan` - query for all services that can be booked using a paid plan.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.paymentOptions.wixPaidPlan": true }" }"```.
  - `service.paymentOptions.custom` - query for all services that has a custom payment method.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.paymentOptions.custom": true }" }"```.
  - `slugs.name` - query for service with given slug.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "slugs.name": "woman-hair-cut" }" }"```.
  - `schedules.tags` - query for all services that has a schedule with given tag and status `CREATED`.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "schedules.tags": "Group" }" }"```.
  - `resources.id` - query for all services that are given by a given resource, taking into account only ACTIVE status service schedule.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "resources.id": "46ce4cd4-46ff-4aa7-9cc0-02fd4f0f3209" }" }"```.
  - `service.policy.bookingsApprovalPolicy.isBusinessApprovalRequired` - query for all services that require business approval.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.policy.bookingsApprovalPolicy.isBusinessApprovalRequired": true }" }"```.
  - `service.schedules.availability.locations.businessLocation.ids` - Not supported. Query for all services that have at least one of the specified locations.
    Example: ```"filter { string_value: "{ "service.schedules.availability.locations.businessLocation.ids": ["66a2674c-9267-4600-826e-f463957b9446", "66a2674c-9267-4600-826e-f463957b9447"] }" }"```.
- **paging**: Supported. Limit Example: "query { paging { limit { value: 10 } } }". Offset Example: "query { paging { offset { value: 10 } } }". Default paging: "query { paging { offset { value: 0 } limit { value: 25 } } }"
- **fieldsets**: not supported.
- **fields**: any projection is supported.
    Example: query { fields ["service.id", "service.status", "service.info.name"] }
**Important**:
  Calling List without any filter, will return all non deleted services.
- All results are for one specific business, resolved from the request context.

> **Permissions**  
> This endpoint requires the Read Bookings - Public Data, the Read Bookings - Including Participants or the Manage Bookings permissions scope

examples.title: Get Services Catalog

extra.description: Returns all the catalog services in the site.
Returns the services catalog, with only the requested fields.

members.name: base
members.doc: The base URL. For premium sites, this will be the domain. For free sites, this would be site URL (e.g mysite.wixsite.com/mysite)

members.name: path
members.doc: The path to that page - e.g /product-page/a-product

members.name: kind
members.doc: The kind of value.

members.name: nullValue
members.doc: Represents a null value.

members.name: numberValue
members.doc: Represents a double value.

members.name: stringValue
members.doc: Represents a string value.

members.name: boolValue
members.doc: Represents a boolean value.

members.name: structValue
members.doc: Represents a structured value.

members.name: listValue
members.doc: Represents a repeated `Value`.

members.name: limit
members.doc: The number of items to load

members.name: offset
members.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by

members.name: order
members.doc: Sort order (ASC/DESC). Defaults to ASC

members.name: filter
members.doc: A filter object. See documentation [here](https://bo.wix.com/wix-docs/rnd/platformization-guidelines/api-query-language#platformization-guidelines_api-query-language_defining-in-protobuf)

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort object in the form [{"fieldName":"sortField1"},{"fieldName":"sortField2","direction":"DESC"}]

members.name: paging
members.doc: Limit number of results

members.name: fields
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of specific field names to return. If fieldsets are also specified, return the union of fieldsets and fields

members.name: fieldsets
members.doc: Projection on the result object - list of named projections. E.g. "basic" will return id and name fields. Specifying multiple fieldsets will return the union of fields from all. Specifying fieldsets and fields will also return the union of fields.

docs.summary: list of URL's that can be used to access the service page and service booking entry point in WiX Bookings.

members.name: servicePageUrl
members.doc: The URL for the service page

members.name: bookingPageUrl
members.doc: The URL for the booking entry point. It can be either to the calendar or to the service page.

members.name: propertyName
members.doc: The name of the property. Required.

members.name: value
members.doc: The value of the property. Optional.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the business

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: Address of business, formatted according to bookings business needs

members.name: language
members.doc: Language of bookings site

members.name: phone
members.doc: Business phone number

members.name: email
members.doc: Business email

members.name: currency
members.doc: Business currency

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Business time zone

members.name: businessType
members.doc: Business the go or using business address

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Business time zone

members.name: id
members.doc: WixMedia image ID

members.name: url
members.doc: URL of image

members.name: height
members.doc: Original image width

members.name: width
members.doc: Original image height

members.name: altText
members.doc: Image alt text. Optional. Not Supported yet.

members.name: type
members.doc: SEO tag type. Supported values: title, meta, script, link.

members.name: props
members.doc: SEO tag attributes/properties (name, content, rel, href).

members.name: meta
members.doc: Tag meta data, e.g. {height: 300, width: 240}.

members.name: children
members.doc: Tag inner content e.g. `<title> inner content </title>`.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether the tag is a custom tag.

members.name: disabled
members.doc: Whether the tag is disabled.

docs.summary: An object that holds SEO schema data.

members.name: tags
members.doc: SEO tags information.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs.Set of custom properties that can be used to hold information in the context of a specific service.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

docs.summary: A service describes the business offering that a business provides to its customers.

members.name: id
members.doc: Service ID.

members.name: info
members.doc: Information about the service.

members.name: policy
members.doc: Description of the bookings policy for this service.

members.name: paymentOptions
members.doc: Various payment options available for use when booking this service.

members.name: categoryId
members.doc: ID of the category for which the service belongs

members.name: bookingFormId
members.doc: ID of the form that visitors will fill out when booking this service.

members.name: scheduleIds
members.doc:
List of schedules of the different sessions and slots which can be booked by visitors and owners for this service.
 Might include any amount of schedules which can have any possible Schedule.ScheduleStatus value.
 Currently, the Bookings application only uses the `CREATED` schedule and there would only be one such schedule.

members.name: customProperties
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.Set of custom properties that can be used to hold information in the context of a specific service.

members.name: status
members.doc: Status of the service.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc: Sorting order of the service within its category.

members.name: advancedSeoData
members.doc: Advanced SEO data

docs.summary: Information describing the service

members.name: name
members.doc: Service name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Service description.

members.name: images
members.doc: Images associated with this service.

members.name: defaultImage
members.doc: Default Image associated with this service. Optional. Not supported yet.

members.name: tagLine
members.doc: Service description - short version.

docs.summary: A set of rules defining the policy of booking that service by visitors and members.

members.name: maxParticipantsPerBooking
members.doc: Max. number of participants per booking that can be specified when booking. Defaults to 1.

members.name: bookUpToXMinutesBefore
members.doc: Latest amount of time that a participant can book before the start time of the booked item (When applied to a schedule this refers to the start time of the first upcoming session (excluding past sessions). Defaults to 0.

members.name: cancelRescheduleUpToXMinutesBefore
members.doc: Latest amount of time that a participant can cancel or reschedule the booking before the start time. Defaults to 0.

members.name: isBookOnlineAllowed
members.doc: Whether online booking is available. Defaults to true.

members.name: isCancelAllowed
members.doc: Whether bookings for this service can be canceled. Defaults to true.

members.name: isRescheduleAllowed
members.doc: Whether bookings for this service can be rescheduled. Defaults to true.

members.name: futureBookingsPolicy
members.doc: Advance booking policy - how far in advance a participant can book sessions, calculated from the current time.

members.name: waitingListPolicy
members.doc: Waitlist policy for the service. Empty by default.

members.name: bookingsApprovalPolicy
members.doc: Bookings approval policy for this service. Empty by default.

members.name: shouldLimit
members.doc: Whether a limit should be imposed on advance bookings.

members.name: limitXMinutesToTheFuture
members.doc: How far in advance a participant can book a session, calculated from the current time. Defaults to 10,080 minutes (3 days).

members.name: isEnabled
members.doc: Whether waitlisting is enabled for the service.

members.name: capacity
members.doc: Number of spots available in waitlist. Defaults to 10 spots.

members.name: timeWindowMinutes
members.doc: Amount of time each participant is given to book once notified that a spot is available. Defaults to 10 minutes.

members.name: isBusinessApprovalRequired
members.doc: Whether bookings to this service require approval.

members.name: requestsAffectsAvailability
members.doc: Whether the bookings requests affect the session or slot availability (e.g., 3 bookings requests for a 10-person session will cause this session to be displayed as having 7 available spots, before the requests are approved).

docs.summary:
Payment options for this service. Multiple payment options can be enabled. For example:
For a service to be paid only online using WiX, then set wix_pay_online=true and the rest should be set to false.
For a service to accept payment online via WiX or in person, set the wix_pay_online=true & wix_pay_in_person=true.

members.name: wixPayOnline
members.doc: Whether a booking made for this service can be paid online through Wix.

members.name: wixPayInPerson
members.doc: Whether a booking made for this service can be paid in person.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether a booking made for this service can be paid in a custom way which is up to the API user to define.

members.name: wixPaidPlan
members.doc: Whether a booking made for this service can be paid using Wix paid plans, e.g., memberships or packages.

docs.summary: A form can be defined by the site owner (Wix provides a default form), that defines and collects the customer's information as provided when booking a service.

members.name: id
members.doc: Form ID.

members.name: header
members.doc: Form header

members.name: actionLabels
members.doc: Available payment actions.

members.name: name
members.doc: Customer's name.

members.name: email
members.doc: Customer's email address.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Customer's phone number.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: Number of participants being booked to the service (displayed in Wix Bookings UI only for services that allow booking multiple people per booking).

members.name: address
members.doc: Customer's address (displayed in Wix Bookings UI only when a service’s location is set to "Customer’s Place").

members.name: customFields
members.doc: Custom fields which can be added to the form.

docs.summary: A booking form usually includes an action (e.g. Book) once all input is entered. The possible labels can be configured by this object.

members.name: offlinePaymentLabel
members.doc: Call to Action (CTA) text to display in Wix Bookings UI for in-person payment.

members.name: onlinePaymentLabel
members.doc: Call to Action (CTA) text to display in Wix Bookings UI for online payment.

members.name: bookingRequestApprovalLabel
members.doc: Call to Action (CTA) text to display in Wix Bookings UI for requesting booking approval.

docs.summary: The header of the form

members.name: description
members.doc: Form description (displayed below the header in Wix Bookings UI).

members.name: title
members.doc: Form title.

members.name: isDescriptionHidden
members.doc: Whether the form description should be displayed in the Wix Bookings UI.

docs.summary: Description of the address form input

members.name: required
members.doc: Whether customer's input in this field is required.

docs.summary: Holds form field information and configuration

members.name: fieldId
members.doc: Field ID.

members.name: label
members.doc: Field label.

members.name: userConstraints
members.doc: Constraints applied to this field.

members.name: additionalLabels
members.doc: Additional labels applied to this field.

members.name: label
members.doc: Additional label applied to this text-only field.

members.name: label
members.doc: Additional label applied to this URL-only field.

members.name: url
members.doc: Returned URL.

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs.Custom properties that can be associated with the category. Optional.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

docs.summary: A service must be associated with a category in order to be exposed in the Wix Bookings UI. Categories are used to group multiple services together.

members.name: id
members.doc: Category ID. Read-only.

members.name: name
members.doc: Category name. Required.

members.name: customProperties
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.Custom properties that can be associated with the category. Optional.

members.name: status
members.doc: Category status Read-only.

members.name: sortOrder
members.doc: Sorting order of the category for Wix Bookings UI. Optional.

members.name: amount
members.doc: The price amount

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency

members.name: downPayAmount
members.doc: Optional. Represents a required down payment as part of the transaction process.

messages.name: labeledPriceOptionsMapEntry
messages.displayName: labeled Price Options Map Entry Object

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs.Mapping between a named price option and the Price itself.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type object

members.name: labeledPriceOptions
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.Mapping between a named price option and the Price itself.

members.name: priceText
members.doc: User defined textual price. Optional.

docs.summary:
Time periods that this location is open for business. Includes a collection of TimePeriod instances.
Aligned with https://developers.google.com/my-business/reference/rest/v4/accounts.locations#businesshours
With a few minor adjustments

members.name: periods
members.doc:
Times that this location is open. Each period represents a range of hours when the location is
open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: specialHourPeriod
members.doc: Exceptions to the business's regular hours.

docs.summary:
A span of time that the business is open,
starting on the specified open day/time and closing on the specified close day/time.
Closing time must occur after the opening time, for example later in the same day, or on a subsequent day.

members.name: openDay
members.doc: Day of the week this period starts on.

members.name: openTime
members.doc:
Time in 24hr ISO 8601 extended format (hh:mm). Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day field.

members.name: closeDay
members.doc: Day of the week this period ends on.

members.name: closeTime
members.doc:
Time in 24hr ISO 8601 extended format (hh:mm). Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day field.

docs.summary: Set of time periods when a location's operational hours differ from its normal business hours.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Date and Time in 24hr iso-8601 Coordinated universal time (UTC)

members.name: endDate
members.doc: Date and Time in 24hr iso-8601 Coordinated universal time (UTC)

members.name: id
members.doc: The ID of the location

members.name: name
members.doc: Display name of the location

members.name: description
members.doc: Free text to better describe the location

members.name: default
members.doc:
Boolean that states the default location.
There can one default location per site, and changes on it affect on the Site Properties.
The default location can't be deleted and can be only marked through SetDefaultLocation api

members.name: status
members.doc: Status of the location. Active by default

members.name: locationType
members.doc: Type of the location

members.name: fax
members.doc: Fax number

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Time zone

members.name: email
members.doc: Email address

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone number

members.name: address
members.doc: Address

members.name: businessSchedule
members.doc:
Represents the time periods that this location is open for business. Holds a collection of TimePeriod instances.
TimePeriod indicates when the location is open. Each period represents a range of hours when the location is
open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Location revision, represent the number of changes on the location

members.name: archived
members.doc:
Boolean that states if the location is archived.
Archived location can't be updated.

members.name: country
members.doc: country code

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: subdivision (usually state or region) code according to ISO 3166-2

members.name: city
members.doc: city name

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: zip/postal code

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: A break down of the street to number and street name

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: A string containing the human-readable address of this location

members.name: hint
members.doc: Free text for human-to-human textual orientation aid purposes

members.name: geocode
members.doc: coordinates of the physical address

members.name: hintPlacement
members.doc: Where the hint should be displayed

docs.summary: A break down of the street to number and street name

members.name: number
members.doc: street number

members.name: name
members.doc: street name

members.name: apt
members.doc: apartment number

docs.summary: Address Geolocation

members.name: latitude
members.doc: Latitude

members.name: longitude
members.doc: Longitude

members.name: address
members.doc: The address as set by the owner. Valid only when location_type is OWNER_CUSTOM.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule Identifier.

members.name: transparency
members.doc: Indicates if the schedule is available during the session. Possible values are: FREE - the schedule is available during the session. BUSY - schedule are not available during the session, this is the default value.

members.name: scheduleOwnerId
members.doc: The linked schedule owner id. Read only. Derived from the schedule_id.

docs.summary: Indicates the time between available slots' start time. e.g., from 5 minute slots (3:00, 3:05, 3:15) and 1 hour slots (3:00, 4:00, 5:00).

members.name: sameAsDuration
members.doc:
Required. Indicates where the value for schedules split interval is specifies.
In case this field is true, the value will be the sum of the first duration in
schedule.availabilityConstraints.SlotDurations field and schedule.availabilityConstraints.TimeBetweenSlots field.

members.name: valueInMinutes
members.doc:
Required in case the same_as_duration field is false.
Optional in case the same_as_duration field is true.

docs.summary:
Schedule's availability calculation is executed by the schedule's available intervals and this additional information.
Schedule's available intervals are recurring intervals (defined in the schedule) minus sessions that has no more spots for bookings (including time between_slots), or schedule's sessions with open spots for bookings.

members.name: start
members.doc: The time the schedule starts to be available for booking. Required.

members.name: end
members.doc: The time schedule stops to be available for booking. Optional. Empty value indicates that there is no end time.

members.name: linkedSchedules
members.doc:
Reference to other schedules for availability calculations. Optional.
Supported only when there are no recurring intervals and with availability calculation constraints.

members.name: constraints
members.doc:
Additional constraints for calculating the schedule's availability for booking. Optional.
Describes how to calculate the specific slots that are available for booking.

docs.summary: Describes how to calculate the specific slots that are available for booking.

members.name: slotDurations
members.doc:
The optional durations of the available slots in minutes. Required. Minimum: 1.
Calculation of the available slots will generate slots with these durations if are not produce a conflict with the available intervals.

members.name: timeBetweenSlots
members.doc:
The time between slots in minutes.
If a slot has already booked, then the start time of the next available slot will be calculated by the booked slot's end time plus the time_between_slots value.
Minimum: 0. Maximum: 120.

members.name: splitInterval
members.doc:
Specify how to split the slots in intervals of minutes.
This value indicates the time between available slots' start time. e.g., from 5 minute slots (3:00, 3:05, 3:15) and 1 hour slots (3:00, 4:00, 5:00).
Optional. The default is the first duration in slot_durations field.
Deprecated. please use the split_slots_interval.value_in_minutes.

members.name: slotsSplitInterval
members.doc:
Specify how to split the slots in intervals of minutes.
This value indicates the time between available slots' start time. e.g., from 5 minute slots (3:00, 3:05, 3:15) and 1 hour slots (3:00, 4:00, 5:00).

members.name: title
members.doc: Optional. When provided this value will be used in the synced title of the external calendar event. Default is Session.title

members.name: description
members.doc: Optional. When provided this value will be used in the synced description of the external calendar event.

members.name: repetition
members.doc: The frequency of the recurrence in weeks. i.e. when this value is 4, the interval occurs every 4 weeks. Optional. The default is 1. minimum: 1, maximum: 52.

members.name: daysOfWeek
members.doc: The day the interval accrue. Optional. The default is the day of the recurring interval's start time.

members.name: hourOfDay
members.doc: The hour of the day the interval accrue. must be consistent with the Interval start time. Options. The default is 0. minimum: 0, maximum: 23.

members.name: minuteOfHour
members.doc: The minutes of hour the interval accrue. must be consistent with the Interval end time. Options. The default is 0. minimum: 0, maximum: 59.

members.name: duration
members.doc: The duration of the interval in minutes. Required. Part of the session end time calculation. minimum: 1, maximum: 86400.

members.name: id
members.doc: The recurring interval identifier.

members.name: start
members.doc: The start time of the recurring interval. Required.

members.name: end
members.doc: The end time of the recurring interval. Optional. Empty value indicates that there is no end time.

members.name: interval
members.doc: The interval rules. The day, hour and minutes the interval is recurring.

members.name: frequency
members.doc: The frequency of the interval. Optional. The default is frequency with the default repetition.

members.name: affectedSchedules
members.doc: Specifies the list of linked schedules and the way this link affects the corresponding schedules' availability. Can be calculated from the schedule or overridden on the recurring interval.

members.name: intervalType
members.doc: The type of recurring interval.

members.name: providerId
members.doc: Conferencing provider ID

members.name: id
members.doc: The conference meeting ID (In WiX Calendar)

members.name: externalId
members.doc: The conference meeting ID in the provider's conferencing system

members.name: providerId
members.doc: The provider Id

members.name: hostUrl
members.doc: URL used by the host to start the conference meeting

members.name: guestUrl
members.doc: URL used by a guest to join the conference meeting

members.name: password
members.doc: Password to join the conference.

members.name: id
members.doc: Participant ID. Required to be provided the api user when adding a participant. The id must be unique.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID (optional).

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the registered participant (optional).

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone number of the contact (optional).

members.name: email
members.doc: Email address of the contact (optional).

members.name: partySize
members.doc: Party size (optional). Defaults to 0. Min value is 0, max value is 250.

members.name: approvalStatus
members.doc: Approval status for the participant. Defaults to UNDEFINED.

members.name: inherited
members.doc:
Whether the participant was inherited from the schedule. Read only.
Inherited from schedule means the participant is registered in this session, because he is registered in the schedule which includes this session.

members.name: id
members.doc: Schedule identifier.

members.name: scheduleOwnerId
members.doc: The id of the schedule's owner. e.g, in case of schedule of a service, service id.

members.name: firstSessionStart
members.doc: The start time of the schedule. Read only. calculated by the start time of the first session.

members.name: lastSessionEnd
members.doc: The end time of the schedule. Read only. calculated by the end time of the last session.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: The time zone of the schedule. Optional.

members.name: intervals
members.doc:
Specifies the intervals for the sessions calculation. Optional. e.g. when creating class service you can add
pattern for recurring intervals, these intervals can be returned as schedule's sessions or available slots if
there are no other availability calculation constraints and the capacity is bigger then the current total number
of sessions' participants.

members.name: title
members.doc:
The textual title of the schedule. Optional.
This is the default title of the schedule's sessions. i.e., a service name. Max length: 6000.

members.name: tags
members.doc:
Tags of the schedule. Optional. e.g., tag as service type. Google sessions tag as "Google".
This is the default tags of the schedule's sessions.

members.name: location
members.doc:
The location of the schedule. Optional.
This is the default location of the schedule's sessions.

members.name: capacity
members.doc:
The maximum number of participants that can be added to this schedule's slots. Optional.
The default is 1. This is the default capacity of the schedule's sessions. minimum: 1, maximum: 1000

members.name: rate
members.doc: The price options offered to book this schedule's slots. Optional. The default is no rate.

members.name: availability
members.doc:
Describes how to calculate the schedule's availability for adding participants. Optional.
Empty value indicates that this schedule is not available for adding participants.
This definition will be applied to the schedule's available intervals. Schedule's available intervals are the
recurring intervals minus sessions that has no more spots, or schedule's sessions with open spots.

members.name: totalNumberOfParticipants
members.doc:
The current number of registered participants on this schedule when this schedule is a bookable slot. Read only.
calculated by the number of participants plus the additional participants.

members.name: participants
members.doc:
The registered participants of this schedule.
Participants who are registered in the schedule, are automatically registered to any session that is derived from the schedule (they are "inherited" from the schedule).
Participants can be added or removed using the Schedules service Participant API.

members.name: externalCalendarOverrides
members.doc:
Optional.
When provided, the values will be used to override default fields values which are synced to external calendar.
Read more in external calendar documentation.

members.name: status
members.doc:
The schedule's status. Optional.
Possible values are: CREATED, This is the default status. CANCELLED, the schedule was cancelled.

members.name: created
members.doc: The time when this schedule was created.

members.name: updated
members.doc: The time when this schedule was last modified.

members.name: version
members.doc: the schedule's version

members.name: inheritedFields
members.doc: A list of fields for which values were inherited from the business.

members.name: conferenceProvider
members.doc: Conferencing Provider. A schedule with a conferencing provider will use to provider information to create a conference meeting on the provider's system when a session is created on the schedule or on one of its linked schedule's.

members.name: calendarConference
members.doc: A conference meeting created for the schedule. This is used when a participant is added to a schedule.

members.name: id
members.doc: Resource's unique ID

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource's name. Required.

members.name: email
members.doc: Resource's email address. Optional.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Resource's phone number. Optional.

members.name: description
members.doc: Resource description. Optional.

members.name: tag
members.doc: Deprecated - use tags instead. Optional.

members.name: tags
members.doc: Resource tags, can be used to tag a resource and later filter resources by these tags. Optional.

members.name: images
members.doc: Resource's images. Optional.

members.name: schedules
members.doc: List of schedules owned by the resources. Required.  Min size 1.

members.name: scheduleIds
members.doc: List of schedule id's owned by the resources.

members.name: status
members.doc: Resource's status. Read only. Default is CREATED.

members.name: id
members.doc: Service ID.

members.name: fields
members.doc: Field names to return in response (leave empty to get all fields).

docs.summary: A full catalog detailed response containing all the information related to a service.

members.name: service
members.doc: The service entity

members.name: pricingPlans
members.doc: All available pricing plans that can be used to book this service.

members.name: resources
members.doc: Resources associated with this service (e.g., the staff member teaching a class).

members.name: form
members.doc: Booking form used to get the customer's input while booking the service.

members.name: schedules
members.doc:
Full schedule details of the service.
 Includes all schedules were assigned to this service. Can have any possible Schedule.ScheduleStatus value.
 Currently, the Bookings application only uses the `CREATED` schedule and there would only be one such schedule.

members.name: category
members.doc: Category associated with the service.

members.name: urls
members.doc: URLs to directly access the service's information page, and the service's booking page in Wix Bookings.

members.name: slugs
members.doc: Slug of the service. This combined with the URL provides the full path to the service's page and booking page.

members.name: status
members.doc: Bookings service status.

members.name: userDefinedSlug
members.doc: User defined Slug of the service. This combined with the URL provides the full path to the service's page and booking page.

docs.summary: The slug is the remainder of the URI which can be used to access the service's page and service's booking page in WiX Bookings.

members.name: name
members.doc: The part of service URL that identifies the service's information page.

docs.summary: A list of catalog service response.
A service catalog information of paid plan that can be used to book this service.

members.name: id
members.doc: The ID of the paid plan.

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of the plan.

members.name: status
members.doc: Status  of the plan

members.name: visible
members.doc: Visibility

members.name: query
members.doc: Default paging - limit: 25, offset: 0

messages.name: _com_wixpress_bookings_services_catalog_api_v1_service_ListServicesBySlugRequest
messages.displayName: List Services By Slug Request Object

members.name: query
members.doc: Default paging - limit: 25, offset: 0

docs.summary: Notification presentation that available to the user of users

members.name: type
members.doc: Defines the type of notification

members.name: isEnabled
members.doc: Identifies if the notification is Enabled

members.name: tags
members.doc: Tags of notification. Optional.  e.g., tag as the service type.

members.name: requireParticipantConsent
members.doc: Specifies whether a user of user would be asked to select this notification.

members.name: info
members.doc: basig business data

members.name: siteUrl
members.doc: site url

members.name: businessProperties
members.doc: business properties

members.name: notificationsSetup
members.doc: notifications view settings

members.name: activeFeatures
members.doc: active booking features for site

members.name: id
members.doc: Resource ID.

members.name: fields
members.doc: Field names to return in response (leave empty to get all fields).

docs.summary:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the `Value` type union. The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`. Possible values are:
  • NULL_VALUE - Null value.

Possible values are:
  • ASC
  • DESC

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • BOOKINGS_PREMIUM
  • WIX_PREMIUM
  • NO_PREMIUM

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • ON_THE_GO
  • ON_LOCATION

Possible values are:
  • CREATED
  • DELETED

Possible values are:
  • SHORT_TEXT - Short text. This is the default value type.
  • LONG_TEXT - Long text
  • CHECK_BOX - a text that represent the check box value: if selected the value is "true", otherwise "false".

Possible values are:
  • CREATED
  • DELETED

Enumerates the days of the week. Possible values are:
  • MONDAY
  • TUESDAY
  • WEDNESDAY
  • THURSDAY
  • FRIDAY
  • SATURDAY
  • SUNDAY

Possible values are:
  • ACTIVE
  • IN_ACTIVE

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • BRANCH
  • OFFICES
  • RECEPTION
  • HEADQUARTERS

Where the hint should be displayed Possible values are:
  • BEFORE
  • AFTER
  • REPLACE

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • OWNER_BUSINESS - The address is determined by the business address as set by the owner in the site’s general settings.
  • OWNER_CUSTOM - The address is determined by the owner.
  • CUSTOM - The address is determined and managed elsewhere

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • FREE - Indicates the schedule is available.
  • BUSY - Indicates the schedule is not available. Default value.

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - Undefined.
  • MON - Monday.
  • TUE - Tuesday.
  • WED - Wednesday.
  • THU - Thursday.
  • FRI - Friday.
  • SAT - Saturday.
  • SUN - Sunday.

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED - The default value. Sessions for this interval will be of type EVENT.
  • EVENT - A recurring interval of events
  • TIME_AVAILABILITY - Deprecated
  • AVAILABILITY - A recurring interval for availability

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • PENDING
  • APPROVED
  • DECLINED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • CREATED
  • CANCELLED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • CREATED
  • DELETED
  • UPDATED

Possible values are:
  • CONSISTENT - The response reflects the current state of the data.
  • EVENTUALLY_CONSISTENT - The response reflects a cached version of the data which might be out-of-date. For Public API users, this will always be the response type.

Possible values are:
  • ACTIVE
  • DELETED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • ACTIVE
  • ARCHIVED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • CONFIRMATION_EMAIL
  • CANCELLATION_EMAIL
  • REMINDER_EMAIL
  • REMINDER_SMS
